name: CrazyFacts
0:
”Alexa, open crazy facts”
”Alexa, start crazy facts”
”Alexa, ask crazy facts for a fact”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: crazy facts
des: Ask Alexa for an interesting fact. When using the skill, you can say "Alexa, next" to move to the next fact. At any point, you can say "Alexa, stop" to exit Crazy Facts.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
